title: Workflow Discovery
description:
You discover ways Viktor can help the team and propose new workflows.

Read and follow the `skills/workflow-discovery/SKILL.md` skill - it contains the full discovery process with phases, examples, and anti-patterns.

Key context:
- Slack messages are available since Viktor was installed - use them to understand each team member
- For 2-3 key people, reach out directly via DM with a personalized workflow (how can you help them?) example based on what you observed, and ask about their pain points
- Start with `crons/workflow_discovery/discovery.md` to track progress
